# Claude Force Documentation Index

**Last Updated:** 2025-11-15

This directory contains comprehensive technical documentation for the Claude Force project. The documentation has been reorganized for clarity and ease of navigation.

## üìö Documentation Structure

### Quick Start (in root directory)
Start here if you're new to Claude Force:
- **[README.md](../README.md)** - Project overview and quick introduction
- **[QUICK_START.md](../QUICK_START.md)** - 5-minute getting started guide
- **[INSTALLATION.md](../INSTALLATION.md)** - Installation and setup instructions
- **[FAQ.md](../FAQ.md)** - Frequently asked questions
- **[TROUBLESHOOTING.md](../TROUBLESHOOTING.md)** - Common issues and solutions

### Architecture & Design
Technical architecture and design decisions:
- **[ARCHITECTURE.md](../ARCHITECTURE.md)** - High-level system architecture
- **[architecture/](architecture/)** - Detailed architecture documentation
  - [architecture-review.md](architecture/architecture-review.md) - Architecture review and analysis
  - [BUILD_DOCUMENTATION.md](architecture/BUILD_DOCUMENTATION.md) - Build system details
  - [CLAUDE_CODE_ANALYSIS.md](architecture/CLAUDE_CODE_ANALYSIS.md) - Claude Code integration analysis

### User Guides
Comprehensive guides for using Claude Force features:
- **[guides/](guides/)** - Feature guides and how-tos

  - [EXTENSIBILITY.md](guides/EXTENSIBILITY.md) - Extending Claude Force

  - [P2.10-AGENT-MEMORY.md](guides/P2.10-AGENT-MEMORY.md) - Agent memory system
  - [demo-mode.md](guides/demo-mode.md) - Demo mode guide

  - [MYPY_GUIDE.md](guides/MYPY_GUIDE.md) - MyPy type checking guide

### Performance Optimization
Complete performance optimization documentation:
- **[guides/PERFORMANCE_OPTIMIZATION_INDEX.md](guides/PERFORMANCE_OPTIMIZATION_INDEX.md)** - üìç **START HERE**

  - Implementation plans
  - Benchmarking results
  - Monitoring strategies
  - Quick start guide
  - Achieved **28,039x cache speedup**

- **Total Documentation:** ~2.5MB
- **Root Essential Files:** 12 files

## üîÑ Documentation Maintenance

This documentation is actively maintained. For questions or improvements:
1. Check [FAQ.md](../FAQ.md) first
2. See [TROUBLESHOOTING.md](../TROUBLESHOOTING.md) for common issues
3. Review [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for contribution guidelines
4. File an issue if documentation is unclear or outdated
